link.title: Chart.js
link.description: Simple yet flexible JavaScript charting for designers & developers

link.title: CreateJS
link.description: A suite of modular libraries and tools which work together or independently to enable rich interactive content on open web technologies via HTML5.

link.title: Code Sniffer
link.description: PHP_CodeSniffer is a set of two PHP scripts; the main phpcs script that tokenizes PHP, JavaScript and CSS files to detect violations of a defined coding standard, and a second phpcbf script to automatically correct coding standard violations. PHP_CodeSniffer is an essential development tool that ensures your code remains clean and consistent.

link.title: CSS3gen
link.description: CSS3Gen allows you to easily generate useful snippets of CSS3 and copy them straight into your projects.

link.title: CSS Tricks
link.description: CSS-Tricks is created by Chris and a team of swell people.
